title: 4C/ID Model-Based Integrated Language·Science·Technology Education (ILS&T) Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience Using Simple Technical Tools
context.additional_context: Task-centered learning utilizing VR simulations and collaboration tools in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design math problem-solving scenarios by applying the four components of the 4C/ID model: learning objectives, supportive information, procedural information, and part-task practice
Learners can develop and receive peer evaluations for at least one educational project integrating language, math, and science concepts in VR-based simulation environments
Learners can analyze 3D geometry problems using smartphone tools, generate data visualization outputs, and submit them

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
